title: Group portrait of Braves Little League baseball team, from left, kneeling: William Abramonitz, Ronald Wright, Reginald Bennett, Roderick Horne, James Montgomery, Curtiss McGee, and Carl Morris; second row: Rickey Moloney, Donald Alexander, Charles Butler, Tyland Richardson, Craig Clark, Montell Brundage, Amos Lawson, Fred Hill, and George Morris; rear: coach Elbert Montgomery, and manager Joseph Geller, posed possibly on Ammon Field
credit_line: Gift of the Estate of Charles "Teenie" Harris
provenance_text: Pittsburgh Courier Photographic Archives, Pittsburgh, PA
